titleStmt.title: Reflections upon a pamphlet entituled, Some discourses upon Dr. Burnet and Dr. Tillotson, occasioned by the late funeral-sermon of the former upon the later by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Half-title and running title reads: The Bishop of Sarum's vindication.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
